author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Space Port) - Space Port Spacecraft Review
review:
This is a good little set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 23 pieces. I don't know how much it was when it was on sale but I think this little model is worth the money.

Minifigures

The figure has a white overall, a white helmet, a golden visor and a headset on his face. It's a very nice minifig for sure.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't have to complain about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/1181-1.jpg[/img]


This set may doesn't do anything but it's still fun to maneuver it. The design on this model looks nice but I don't think that lot's of you would have liked this set if it was produced this year. As I told you in the beginning: It's a good little set to have - even for pieces which you can use for future MOC's and/or brickfilms for sure.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
